title: Welcome to Exotic Matter
description:
Welcome to the inaugural episode of Exotic Matter, where we explore the evolving landscape of knowledge work and expertise.

**Topics:**
- What is Exotic Matter and why does it exist?
- What kinds of conversations will we be having?
- Who are the guests and what can you expect from them?

[João Landeiro](https://www.linkedin.com/in/joaolandeiro/) is the host of Exotic Matter and founder of Mesozoic. This introductory episode sets the stage for conversations about productizing expertise and the future of knowledge work.
